text: Lucia Quinney Mee BEM (28 May 1999 â€“ 24 May 2020) was a Northern Irish campaigner for organ donation, having had four liver transplants herself, the first at the age of eight. She took part in the 2016 Transplant Games. She started the Live Loudly Donate Proudly campaign. == References == ==Other websites== * lucia.mee - Live Loudly Donate Proudly Category:1999 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from County Antrim Category:Organ transplant recipients Category:British health activists
title: Lucia Mee
